long_description: The NEMO Cosmo(TM) Air Sleeping Pad is equipped with a built-in foot pump for easy inflation, and it features 3 in. of plush comfort for a restful night's sleep on the cold, hard ground. Pad features 3 in. baffled air chambers that evenly distribute weight; horizontal baffles create a flat sleeping surface and eliminate any bouncy feel. Give your lungs a break and use the built-in foot pump at the end of the pad to inflate the pad quickly and easily. Dual valves provide maximum airflow for rapid inflation; valve on the underside opens for quick deflation. Pillow baffle at the head area supports your head and adds no weight to the pad. 75-denier polyester fabric resists puncture while keeping the weight down. NEMO Cosmo Air Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack, compression strap and repair kit.
short_description: The NEMO Cosmo(TM) Air Sleeping Pad is equipped with a built-in foot pump for easy inflation, and it features 3 in. of plush comfort for a restful night's sleep on the cold, hard ground.
